sentences.sContent: The green wallpaper is the perfect complement to the old pine of the dresser.
sentences.sCn: 绿色墙纸是旧松木梳妆台的完美衬托。

sentences.sContent: There will be a written examination to complement the practical test.
sentences.sCn: 会有一次书面考试来补充实践测试。

trans.tranOther: someone or something that emphasizes the good qualities of another person or thing
If people or things complement each other, they are different or do something different, which makes them a good combination
